urn:uuid:d0e71b2f-1308-4b03-8900-50d6f1c.title: Flicker from Within: River of Signals

data.keywords: cultural computing, signal rivers, photorealism, glowing currents, circuit board, ambient blue light, abstraction, digital diffusion
data.description: In this image, signal currents emerge from a circuit board and flow like glowing rivers into an abstract and softly illuminated world. Blending photorealistic elements with ambient blue-white light, it symbolizes the diffusion of cultural computing across unseen terrain—modern, fluid, and alive with memory. AI-generated with prompt: 'A high-resolution digital photograph blends technological precision with abstraction. Blue and white signal currents extend from a printed circuit board, flowing outward as glowing rivers of light. These river-like paths move into an abstract space beyond the board, softly illuminating a modern, ambient landscape. The environment remains photorealistic and minimally diffused, capturing the expansion of digital memory and culture through signal.'
data.usageInfo: For academic use in a digital curation exhibit on cultural computing
